Room.Name: Lost in the Respitial Sea
Room.ShortDescription: You are floating on the waves of a vast sea, hopelessly lost.
Room.LongDescription: You are going to have to find land soon. The weather can't stay like this forever. If it gets rough you might be swept even further out to sea, and thus eliminate any chance at all of ever getting back to Oceancrest. Have you ever heard the stories in the pubs of the pirate ship Snapdragon?
